sentences.en: A pale reddish glow lit the sky.
sentences.cn: 略带红色的淡淡光辉照亮了天空。

sentences.en: A singular glow came from the unidentified flying object.
sentences.cn: 从不明飞行物上发出奇特的光.

sentences.en: Exercise will give you a glow of satisfaction at having achieved something.
sentences.cn: 运动将让你体会到一种有所成就的无比喜悦感。

sentences.en: Give yourself a healthy glow on our detox diet.
sentences.cn: 我们的解毒食谱将会让您容光焕发。

sentences.en: He felt a glow of pride in what she had accomplished.
sentences.cn: 他为她取得的成绩深感自豪。

sentences.en: His face took on an affectionate glow.
sentences.cn: 他的脸上洋溢着热情的红光.

sentences.en: I felt a pleasant glow in all my veins from the wine.
sentences.cn: 喝过酒后我浑身的血都热烘烘的,感到很舒服.

sentences.en: She felt a glow of satisfaction at her son's achievements.
sentences.cn: 她因儿子的成就而感到心满意足.

sentences.en: She had a healthy glow in her cheeks.
sentences.cn: 她脸上泛着健康的红晕。

sentences.en: The bedside lamp glowed dimly.
sentences.cn: 床头灯发出暗淡的光。

sentences.en: the dim glow of the fire in the grate
sentences.cn: 壁炉里微弱的火光

sentences.en: The fireplace was still glowing with the remains of last night’s fire.
sentences.cn: 壁炉中，隔夜的余烬依然在微微发光。

sentences.en: the glow from the dying fire
sentences.cn: 快要熄灭的火光

sentences.en: The glow went out of his voice.
sentences.cn: 他说话的声音不那么激动了.

sentences.en: The moisturiser gave my face a healthy glow that lasted all day.
sentences.cn: 涂了润肤霜，我的脸一整天都红润亮泽。

sentences.en: The moisturizer gave my face a healthy glow that lasted all day.
sentences.cn: 这种润肤霜给我脸上带来了持续整天的一种健康的红光。

sentences.en: The red tip of his cigarette was glowing in the dark.
sentences.cn: 他那红红的烟头在黑暗中幽幽发光。

sentences.en: The splendid evening glow in the sky means another fine day tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 灿烂的晚霞预示明天又是好天气.

sentences.en: The sunset glow is just like a picture.
sentences.cn: 晚霞恰如一幅图画.

sentences.en: The sunset glow tinted the sky red.
sentences.cn: 晚霞染红了天空.

sentences.en: Used together these colours will make your interiors glow with warmth and vitality.
sentences.cn: 这些颜色搭配使用会使你屋子里暖意融融，充满生机。
